tool_description: Automatically generates different types of exercises from a plain English text
name: English Exercises
title: English Exercises

api_list.name: text2lesson
api_list.description: This API converts any English text into grammar and vocabulary exercises labelled with CEFR levels of language difficulty.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://english-exercises.p.rapidapi.com/v1/lesson/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-exercises.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://english-exercises.p.rapidapi.com/v1/lesson/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "english-exercises.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
